import React from 'react'; import './Logo.css'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import LogoHeader from './Logo header' import './Curriculum.css' import Navigation from './Navigation' const Curriculum = () => { return (
What We Offer

Stretch UK offers 4 services.

R.E.A.C.H programme

Aimed at young people aged 11+ but can be adapted for younger children. Can be ran as part of the enrichment programme for years 12&13

Combines practical dance and short teaching sessions which explore 5 key areas with the aim to promote positive wellbeing. Entails looking at the domains of resilience and different coping Strategies for some of life’s common stresses for the targeted age group.

Programme 2
Number of Participants  5-200
Duration 3 x 1 hour session
Modules Her Self-esteem, Her Bra, Her Period
Aims Help girls to develop their self-esteem, build and establish their confidence, help them to understand their personal value and unlock hidden potential
Course Summary This programme takes the time to look at each topic in Her Self-esteem and really build a young person’s self-esteem. Each session is centered around a topic and the room is decorated to fit with theme
  • Session 1: Worth

    Room is decorated with Jewellery and Gems

    Topics covered: Value, the body’s value, being unique

    Tools: Presentation, body image handouts, Barbie presentation - what would she look like if she was real?
  • Session 1: Strength

    Room is decorated with Pearls and Stones

    Topics covered: Resilience, Getting up after being knocked down, Changing your bad mood to a good mood

    Tools: Presentation, Pearl and diamond creation video, Joni Eareckson Tada video
  • Session 1: Purpose

    Room is decorated with Flowers

    Topics covered: Growth, Dreams and the Future

    Tools: Presentation, plants, collage
Programme 3
Number of Participants  5-200
Duration 1 hour
Modules Her Self-esteem
Tools Presentation, Bra manufacturing video, menstrual cycle presentation
Aims Help girls to develop their self esteem, build and establish their confidence, understand their personal value and unlock hidden potential
Course Summary This session focuses on the Her Self-esteem module teaching the young women about their Worth, Strength and Purpose. Participants first discuss the value of various objects and then the value and learn interesting fun facts about their own body which leads to the conclusion that each person is in fact priceless. A jar of positive affirmations is passed around for them pick one and keep. Her Strength highlights emotional intelligence and resilience using a video on pearl and diamond creation. Kemi shares her own experience in not valuing her emotions and teaches on how to make good decsions when you don't feel like it. Lastly this session ends with HerPurpose invites the participants to dream Big whilst teaching them the value of a seed whether it be an idea or a task and how that can grow, this is shown with an interactive example with a plant pot. The programme ends with a Q&A session.
Programme 4
Number of Participants  5-200
Duration 1 hour
Modules Her Bra, Her Period
Tools Presentation, Bra manufacturing video, menstrual cycle presentation
Aims Help girls to have a clear and correct understanding on the ins and out of their period and bra.
Course Summary In this programme we take what is taught in the Her Basics and spend more time explaining the value of our bodies and how this relates to Her Bra and Her Period
); }; export default Curriculum;
